snippet.textDisplay:
i'm thankful that valve going for VR in their new game. i hope that this will open up and encourage more people perfecting VR so we can use whole body to enter the world instead using controller.
yes, this is still early development of VR and i hope majority fans of Half Life won't hate this.
will this be a flop ? maybe. will this be a game that will change VR industry ? maybe. but this will be an attempt to perfecting VR gaming in the future and i hope this would be a success.
snippet.textOriginal:
i'm thankful that valve going for VR in their new game. i hope that this will open up and encourage more people perfecting VR so we can use whole body to enter the world instead using controller.
yes, this is still early development of VR and i hope majority fans of Half Life won't hate this.
will this be a flop ? maybe. will this be a game that will change VR industry ? maybe. but this will be an attempt to perfecting VR gaming in the future and i hope this would be a success.

snippet.textDisplay:
My plead to all VR devs and marketeers:
STOP. WITH. THE. SHITTY. ACTING.
No need to overact every tiny nuanced gesture. No need to swing the gun up before aiming.
snippet.textOriginal:
My plead to all VR devs and marketeers:  
STOP. WITH. THE. SHITTY. ACTING.  
No need to overact every tiny nuanced gesture. No need to swing the gun up before aiming.
